page.title: 12STUART'S ROOM. AGED 11
page.content: I share my room with my brother. We have bunk beds in the corner of the room, next to the cupboard. In the other corner there is a large box, to make headroom for the stairs. On top of the box we have a television set, a wooden play fort and a telescope. On the window sill is an ornamental{Loch {Ness Monster}and 5 rubber dinosaurs. I have an old open fire-place which is not in use anymore. It has an alarm-clock and a fluffy owl that my grandma made me on it. I have 2 bookcases full of books. There are also 2 wardrobes, one for my mum and one for my dad, brother and me. The room is painted green and the carpet is brown with a leaf pattern on it. I also have posters and stickers on my walls and door.
